data.title: EarthShadow: Calculator for dark matter particle velocity distribution after Earth-scattering
data.name: EarthShadow
data.description: A tool for calculating the impact of Earth-scattering on the distribution of Dark Matter (DM) particles. Includes (Mathematica) code, numerical results, plots and animations.

evidence: "The `EarthShadow` code is a tool for calculating the impact of Earth-scattering on the distribution of Dark Matter (DM) particles. The code allows you to calculate the speed and velocity distributions of DM at various positions on the Earth..."
"code: The code folder contains the core of the `EarthShadow` code, in the form of a *Mathematica* package and example notebook."
"Please contact Bradley Kavanagh (bradkav@gmail.com) for any questions, problems, bugs and suggestions."
